home.intro: Explore the workflow engine, freshness checks, document generation, and audit visibility in one place.
home.timelinePlural: You have {count, plural, one {# active step} other {# active steps}}
home.billingCardDescription: Check your plan, renewal date, and payment status at a glance.

billing.title: Subscription & billing
billing.description: Review your current Stripe subscription, billing mode, and renewal dates.

empty.heading: No subscription found
empty.body: Provision a plan via the billing API to see subscription status here.

privacy.title: Privacy Notice
privacy.summary: FreshComply explains how we process personal data as both controller and processor.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.summary: Contractual terms governing access to the FreshComply platform.

subprocessors.title: Subprocessor Registry
subprocessors.summary: Vendors engaged to deliver the service and how we notify changes.

cookies.title: Cookie & Consent Policy
cookies.summary: Categories of cookies used and how to manage preferences.

workflow.timelineDescription: Timeline view with phases, due dates, and assignments.
workflow.evidenceDescription: Review source links and refresh freshness checks as required.
workflow.orchestrationDescription: Launch Temporal workflows, send signals, or capture manual updates for each step.
workflow.orchestrationTemporalHint: Temporal worker handles retries and polling.
workflow.orchestrationManualHint: Manual execution tracked via calendar reminders and evidence uploads.
workflow.orchestrationWebhookHint: Invoke signed tenant webhooks and review response hashes.
workflow.orchestrationManualComplete: Marked complete — upload evidence via the panel above.

board.title: Task board
board.description: Drag-and-drop coming soon. For now, review assignments across workflow statuses.

auth.title: Secure sign-in
auth.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a magic link to access FreshComply.
auth.success: Check your inbox for a sign-in link. The link expires in 5 minutes.
auth.redirect: After sign-in you'll be sent to {destination}.
auth.error: We couldn't send the link. Please try again.
auth.supabaseUnavailable: Supabase configuration is missing. Set NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL and NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY to enable sign-in.

overlayBuilder.heading: Tenant overlay builder
overlayBuilder.description: Compose JSON Patch overlays with registry-backed steps and preview impact before publishing.

base.heading: Base workflow
base.hint: These are the core steps before tenant overlays are applied.

add.heading: Add registry step
add.hint: Select an approved step type, provide input defaults, and bind secret aliases.
add.executionHint: Configure runtime metadata for the selected step.

overlay.heading: Overlay impact
overlay.count: {count, plural, one {# overlay operation} other {# overlay operations}}

messages.secretRequired: Select a secret alias before inserting this step.
messages.secretUnavailable: No eligible secret bindings are available for this step type.
messages.executionWebhookUrlAliasRequired: Select a webhook URL alias before inserting this step.
messages.executionWebsocketUrlAliasRequired: Select a websocket URL alias before inserting this step.
messages.executionAliasInvalid: Alias values must reference secret bindings, not literal URLs.
messages.executionAliasUnavailable: No eligible secret aliases are available for this execution configuration.

manualReview.title: Manual review (dual control)
manualReview.summary: Collect reviewer notes and capture evidence before approving the step.

temporalWebhook.title: Temporal webhook bridge
temporalWebhook.summary: Trigger a tenant-specific Temporal workflow via signed webhook requests.

externalWebhook.title: Tenant webhook call
externalWebhook.summary: Invoke an external webhook with alias-resolved credentials and signing.

externalWebsocket.title: WebSocket listener bridge
externalWebsocket.summary: Listen to tenant event streams and route messages via Temporal workflows.

secrets.crmApiToken: CRM API token resolved at runtime.
secrets.temporalQueue: Temporal task queue signing key stored in vault.
secrets.webhookToken: Bearer token alias resolved per tenant.
secrets.webhookSignature: Webhook signature secret alias resolved per tenant.

funding.heading: Funding Radar
funding.description: Track public grant awards and calls so you can line up the next opportunity.
funding.totalResults: {count, plural, one {# opportunity found} other {# opportunities found}}
funding.noResults: No funding opportunities match the current filters.
funding.loadError: Funding data unavailable right now. Please try again soon.

partnerAdmin.title: Partner admin
partnerAdmin.description: Manage white-label branding and domains for this tenant.

branding.heading: Brand & theme
branding.intro: Configure tenant logos, colours, and typography applied across the portal and exported documents.

domains.heading: Custom domains
domains.intro: Manage tenant domains, track certificate status, and control the primary host.
